course_description: This course is an advanced analytics course focusing on data science and the development of data products. Data science is an emerging interdisciplinary field that draws from computer science, statistics, business, as well as other fields. All of the typical phases of data science projects will be discussed in the course: data acquisition, data cleaning, storage and retrieval, data analysis, and production product development.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
